Scn QSATTTInitialScript
int iQuickThrowLoaded int iJWHInstalled int iGRAInstalled
int iInit int iRestart int iModInitiallyDisabled int iShowJAMError int iShowQTError
string_var svJAMorJWHFull string_var svJAMorJWH
ref refJWHQuest ref refGRAKatana ref refGRAShishkebab ref refQTQuestRef
string_var svOldPlugins int iOldPluginsInstalled int iOldVersionInstalled int iShowOnce float fVersionNumber
Begin Gamemode
if eval !(QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch) ;iMasterSwitch is the var that switches if the user turns off the mod via MCM, 0 is mod running, 1 is mod off
if fVersionNumber > 0 && fVersionNumber < 2.3 set iOldVersionInstalled to 1 if GetGameRestarted set iShowOnce to 1 endif endif
if iInit == 0 ;Very inital setup for MCM quest to set up vars StartQuest QSMCMVarsQuest set iInit to 1 set fVersionNumber to 2.3 endif
if eval !(iOldVersionInstalled)
if GetGameRestarted || iRestart ;iRestart is set to 1 if the mod is turned off via MCM, it allows this quest to restart the trigger quest if the mod is turned off. It is set at the end of this script if iMasterSwitch != 1 if eval !(iRestart) || iModInitiallyDisabled
set iOldPluginsInstalled to 0
if (GetPluginVersion "JIP NVSE Plugin") < 56.42 set iOldPluginsInstalled to 1 let svOldPlugins := "JIP LN NVSE" endif if (GetPluginVersion "JohnnyGuitarNVSE") < 4.35 if eval !(iOldPluginsInstalled) let svOldPlugins := "JohnnyGuitarNVSE" else let svOldPlugins := $svOldPlugins + ", JohnnyGuitarNVSE" endif set iOldPluginsInstalled to iOldPluginsInstalled + 1 endif if (GetPluginVersion "kNVSE") < 20 if eval !(iOldPluginsInstalled) let svOldPlugins := "kNVSE" else let svOldPlugins := $svOldPlugins + ", kNVSE" endif set iOldPluginsInstalled to iOldPluginsInstalled + 1 endif
if eval !(iOldPluginsInstalled)
Call QSAnimationSetS call QSAnimationSetS2 Call QSHipAnimationSetS
InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 Spine2|ATTT Node LS" ;inserting nodes to be used to attach weapons to, in this mod, vars that need identifying are denoted: LS = Left Shoulder, InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 Spine2|ATTT Node RS" ;RS = Right Shoulder, LH = Left Hip, RH = Right Hip, and are dealt with in that order as the script runs InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 Pelvis|ATTT Node LH" InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 Pelvis|ATTT Node RH" InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 Spine|ATTT Node RHGren"
InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 L Thigh|ATTT Node LHL" InsertNode PlayerRef 3 "Bip01 R Thigh|ATTT Node RHL"
if IsModLoaded "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" let refGRAKatana := GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "000817" let refGRAShishkebab := GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "00080F" let iGRAInstalled := 1 ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "000805") ; Lil Devil else let refGRAKatana := 0 let refGRAShishkebab := 0 let iGRAInstalled := 0 endif
if IsModLoaded "JustAssortedMods.esp" let refJWHQuest := BuildRef (GetModIndex "JustAssortedMods.esp") 26624 let svJAMorJWHFull := "Just Assorted Mods" let svJAMorJWH := "JAM" let iJWHInstalled := 1 elseif IsModLoaded "JustWeaponHweel.esp" let refJWHQuest := BuildRef (GetModIndex "JustWeaponHweel.esp") 26624 let svJAMorJWHFull := "Just Weapoon Hweel" let svJAMorJWH := "JWH" let iJWHInstalled := 1 else let iJWHInstalled := 0 endif
if iJWHInstalled == 1 if eval IsFormValid refJWHQuest && GetType refJWHQuest == 71 && HasVariable "aItem", refJWHQuest let QSATTTMainQ.refJWHQuest := refJWHQuest set iShowJAMError to 0 else if eval !(iShowJAMError) MessageBoxExAlt QSATTTJAMErrorMsgUDF "%z has been detected but Armed to the Teeth has failed to access %z's data. This could be because you have an old version of %z installed, or because you have merged %z into another mod. AttT will still work, but you will not be able to use JWH's hotkeys with it.|OK|OK, Disable this error message." svJAMorJWHFull svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH endif let iJWHInstalled := 0 endif endif
if IsModLoaded "Quickthrow.esp" let refQTQuestRef := BuildRef (GetModIndex "Quickthrow.esp") 2782 if eval IsFormValid refQTQuestRef && GetType refQTQuestRef == 71 && HasVariable "rCurrentWeap", refQTQuestRef let iQuickThrowLoaded := 1 let QSATTTMainQ.refQTQuestRef := refQTQuestRef set iShowQTError to 0 else if eval !(iShowQTError) MessageBoxExAlt QSATTTQTErrorMsgUDF "B42Quickthrow has been detected but Armed to the Teeth has failed to access Quickthrow's data. This could be because you have an old version of Quickthrow installed, or because you have merged Quickthrow into another mod. AttT will still work, but you will not be able to use JWH's hotkeys with it.|OK|OK, Disable this error message." endif let iQuickThrowLoaded := 0 let QSATTTMainQ.refQTQuestRef := 0 endif elseif iQuickThrowLoaded == 1 let QSATTTMainQ.rGrenCur := 0 set iQuickThrowLoaded to 0 endif
if IsModLoaded "ClassicPack.esm" ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "FalloutNV.esm" "1735D4") ; 10mm Perorder Pistol endif
if IsModLoaded "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" "001375") ; 10mm Perorder Pistol endif elseif iOldPluginsInstalled == 1 MessageBoxEx "Armed to the Teeth has detected that your %z plugin is out of date. Please update this plugin to use Armed to the Teeth. Armed to the Teeth will be disabled for this playsession." svOldPlugins elseif iOldPluginsInstalled > 1 MessageBoxEx "Armed to the Teeth has detected that your %z plugins are out of date. Please update these plugins to use Armed to the Teeth. Armed to the Teeth will be disabled for this playsession." svOldPlugins endif
endif
if eval !(iOldPluginsInstalled)
if GetGameLoaded endif
set iRestart to 0 set iModInitiallyDisabled to 0
if GetQR QSATTTMainQ == 0 StartQuest QSATTTMainQ endif
endif
elseif eval GetGameLoaded && !(iOldPluginsInstalled)
if IsModLoaded "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" let refGRAKatana := GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "000817" let refGRAShishkebab := GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "00080F" let iGRAInstalled := 1 ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "GunRunnersArsenal.esm" "000805") ; Lil Devil else let refGRAKatana := 0 let refGRAShishkebab := 0 let iGRAInstalled := 0 endif
if IsModLoaded "JustAssortedMods.esp" let refJWHQuest := BuildRef (GetModIndex "JustAssortedMods.esp") 26624 let svJAMorJWHFull := "Just Assorted Mods" let svJAMorJWH := "JAM" let iJWHInstalled := 1 elseif IsModLoaded "JustWeaponHweel.esp" let refJWHQuest := BuildRef (GetModIndex "JustWeaponHweel.esp") 26624 let svJAMorJWHFull := "Just Weapoon Hweel" let svJAMorJWH := "JWH" let iJWHInstalled := 1 else let iJWHInstalled := 0 endif
if iJWHInstalled == 1 if eval IsFormValid refJWHQuest && GetType refJWHQuest == 71 && HasVariable "aItem", refJWHQuest let QSATTTMainQ.refJWHQuest := refJWHQuest set iShowJAMError to 0 else if eval !(iShowJAMError) MessageBoxExAlt QSATTTJAMErrorMsgUDF "%z has been detected but Armed to the Teeth has failed to access %z's data. This could be because you have an old version of %z installed, or because you have merged %z into another mod. AttT will still work, but you will not be able to use JWH's hotkeys with it.|OK|OK, Disable this error message." svJAMorJWHFull svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH svJAMorJWH endif let iJWHInstalled := 0 endif endif
set iRestart to 0 set iModInitiallyDisabled to 0
if IsModLoaded "Quickthrow.esp" let refQTQuestRef := BuildRef (GetModIndex "Quickthrow.esp") 2782 if eval IsFormValid refQTQuestRef && GetType refQTQuestRef == 71 && HasVariable "rCurrentWeap", refQTQuestRef let iQuickThrowLoaded := 1 let QSATTTMainQ.refQTQuestRef := refQTQuestRef else MessageBoxEx "B42Quickthrow has been detected but Armed to the Teeth has failed to access Quickthrow's data. This could be because you have an old version of Quickthrow installed, or because you have merged Quickthrow into another mod. AttT will still work, but you will not be able to use JWH's hotkeys with it." let iQuickThrowLoaded := 0 let QSATTTMainQ.refQTQuestRef := 0 endif elseif iQuickThrowLoaded == 1 let QSATTTMainQ.rGrenCur := 0 set iQuickThrowLoaded to 0 endif
if IsModLoaded "ClassicPack.esm" ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "FalloutNV.esm" "1735D4") ; 10mm Perorder Pistol endif
if IsModLoaded "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" "001375") ; 10mm Perorder Pistol endif
if GetQR QSATTTMainQ == 0 StartQuest QSATTTMainQ endif
Endif elseif iShowOnce MessageBoxEx "You have updated Armed to the Teeth without creating a clean save as instructed on the mod page. Please create a clean save to use this version of Armed to the Teeth, instructions to create one are in the Install Instructions section on the mod page. Kind regards, Quicksilver500." set iShowOnce to 0 endif else if GetGameRestarted set iModInitiallyDisabled to 1 endif set iRestart to 1 endif
End

if IsModLoaded "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" ListAddForm QSATTTListHolsterExclude (GetFormFromMod "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" "001375") ; 10mm Perorder Pistol endif
if GetQR QSATTTMainQ == 0 StartQuest QSATTTMainQ endif

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapon Holster Menu^Please Select a Holster Option for your %z:|Long Gun Holster|Automatic Rifle Holster|Small Revolver Holster|Large Revolver Holster|Pistol Holster|Katana Sheath|Machete Sheath|Knife Sheath|.357 Magnum Holster|Broad Machete Sheath|Force No Visible Holster|Default|Cancels?
You must have a weapon equipped to choose a visible holster option - Armed to the Teeth
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须有一个武器装备选择一个可见的枪套选项 - 武装到牙齿
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageBoxEx "You must have a weapon equipped to choose a visible holster option - Armed to the Teeth"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Scn QSATTTMainS
ref rWeapCur ref rWeapPrev
ref rCEArmor ref rCEBackpack
ref rHkLSWeap ref rHkRSWeap ref rHkLHWeap ref rHkRHWeap ref rGrenCur ref rHkLSWeapPrev ref rHkRSWeapPrev ref rHkLHWeapPrev ref rHkRHWeapPrev ref rGrenPrev
ref refJWHQuest ref refQTQuestRef ref refGRAShishkebab ref refGRAKatana
int iWeapTypeCur int iWeapTypePrev int iHkLSWeapType int iHkRSWeapType int iHkLHWeapType int iHkRHWeapType int iGrenType
int iLSModFlags int iRSModFlags int iLHModFlags int iRHModFlags int iLSModFlagsPrev int iRSModFlagsPrev int iLHModFlagsPrev int iRHModFlagsPrev
int iGrenCountWasZero int iGrenCountReset
int iWeapFlagsBP int iWeapFlagsBPPrev int iBit5 int iBit5Prev int iBPEquipped int iBPEquippedPrev int iRSIs2HMelee int iRSIs2HMeleePrev int iCEisHKWeap int iCEisHKWeapPrev int iUnEqEq
int iHolstersMCMPrev int iShowGrenadeMCMPrev int iGrenadeSideMCM int iLoweredWeapsPrev
int iMainQuestRun int iMCMAnimChange int iRestarted int iModWasDisabled int iHolsterChange int iGameLoadedDetach int iGameLoaded
string_var svCEWeapName
array_var avLSNodePos array_var avJWHWeapArray
Begin Gamemode
if GetGameRestarted set iRestarted to 1 if GetGameLoaded endif elseif GetGameLoaded set iGameLoadedDetach to 1 Call QSATTTDetachUDF set iGameLoadedDetach to 0 set iGameLoaded to 1 endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1) Variable Collection ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch == 0
let rWeapCur := Player.GetEquippedObject 5 let rCEArmor := Player.GetEquippedObject 2 set rCEBackpack to Player.GetEquippedObject 7 let avLSNodePos := Player.GetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 0 1 let iBPEquipped := (IsFormValid rCEBackpack)
if IsFormValid rCEArmor
let iBit5 := GetBit (GetEquipmentBipedMask rCEArmor), 5 ;PowerArmor
if eval !(iBit5) let iBit5 := GetBit (GetEquipmentBipedMask rCEArmor), 2 ;HasBackpack endif
else let iBit5 := 0 endif
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys
let avJWHWeapArray := GetArrayVariable "aItem", refJWHQuest
if avJWHWeapArray == ar_Null let avJWHWeapArray := Ar_List 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 endif
endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice ;Getting the Left Shoulder weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkLSWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1] else let rHkLSWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkLSWeap && GetType rHkLSWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkLSWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iLSModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkLSWeap) else let iLSModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkLSWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkLSWeap
else set iHkLSWeapType to 0 let iLSModFlags := 0 let rHkLSWeap := 0 endif
else set iHkLSWeapType to 0 let iLSModFlags := 0 let rHkLSWeap := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice ;Getting the Right Shoulder weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkRSWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2] else let rHkRSWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkRSWeap && GetType rHkRSWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkRSWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iRSModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkRSWeap) else let iRSModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkRSWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkRSWeap
else set iHkRSWeapType to 0 let iRSModFlags := 0 let rHkRSWeap := 0 endif else set iHkRSWeapType to 0 let rHkRSWeap := 0 let iRSModFlags := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3MCMChoice ;Getting the Left Hip weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkLHWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3] else let rHkLHWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkLHWeap && GetType rHkLHWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkLHWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iLHModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkLHWeap) else let iLHModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkLHWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkLHWeap
else set iHkLHWeapType to 0 let iLHModFlags := 0 let rHkLHWeap := 0 endif else set iHkLHWeapType to 0 let iLHModFlags := 0 let rHkLHWeap := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4MCMChoice ;Getting the Right Hip weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkRHWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4] else let rHkRHWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkRHWeap && GetType rHkRHWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkRHWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iRHModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkRHWeap) else let iRHModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkRHWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkRHWeap
else set iHkRHWeapType to 0 let iRHModFlags := 0 let rHkRHWeap := 0 endif else set iHkRHWeapType to 0 let iRHModFlags := 0 let rHkRHWeap := 0 endif
if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur ;Bunch of checks if we have a weapon equipped currently
set iWeapFlagsBP to GetBit (GetWeaponFlags1 rWeapCur), 4 ;'Hide Backpack' flag, eg. Mingun, Gatling laser, Shishkebab set iWeapTypeCur to GetWeaponType rWeapCur
if eval rWeapCur != rHkLSWeap && rWeapCur != rHkLHWeap && rWeapCur != rHkRHWeap ;if the right weapon is 2 hand melee it affects weapon positions & animations, so it needs to be checked: if iWeapTypeCur == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 elseif eval iHkRSWeapType == 2 && iWeapTypeCur != 5 && iWeapTypeCur != 6 && iWeapTypeCur != 7 && iWeapTypeCur != 9 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif elseif iHkRSWeapType == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif
if rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap ;we sometimes need to check if the current weapon is a hotkey weapon, not a fun to do lots of times, so it's done here once and the var is set set iCEisHKWeap to 1 elseif rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 2 elseif rWeapCur == rHkLHWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 3 elseif rWeapCur == rHkRHWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 4 else set iCEisHKWeap to 0 endif
else if iHkRSWeapType == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif set iCEisHKWeap to 0 set iWeapTypeCur to 0 set iWeapFlagsBP to 0 endif
if eval IsFormValid rGrenCur
if eval Player.GetItemCount rGrenCur == 0 || (rGrenCur == rWeapCur && Player.GetItemCount rGrenCur == 1) ;Snippet to figure out if the grenade weapon should be displayed based on current amount in player's inventory
if iGrenCountWasZero == 0 let iGrenCountReset := 1 let iGrenCountWasZero := 1 endif
elseif iGrenCountWasZero
let iGrenCountWasZero := 0 let iGrenCountReset := 1
endif endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1.b) Grenade Select detection & Holster menu hotkey ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iQuickThrowLoaded == 1 && IsFormValid refQTQuestRef
set rGrenCur to GetRefVariable "rCurrentWeap", refQTQuestRef set iGrenType to GetWeaponType rGrenCur
elseif IsKeyPressed QSMCMVarsQuest.GrenadeKey == 1 if IsFormValid rWeapCur if iWeapTypeCur > 9 if rWeapCur != rGrenPrev PlaySound WPNGrenadeFragUnequip let rGrenCur := Player.GetEquippedObject 5 set iGrenType to GetWeaponType rWeapCur endif endif else set rWeapCur to 0 set iGrenType to 0 playsound WPNGrenadeFragUnequip endif endif else set rGrenCur to 0 set iGrenType to 0 endif
if eval IsKeyPressed QSMCMVarsQuest.HolsterKey == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur && GetType rWeapCur == 40 && iWeapTypeCur != 0 && iWeapTypeCur < 8 let svCEWeapName := GetName rWeapCur MessageBoxExAlt QSATTTHolsterMsgUDF "^ATTT Weapon Holster Menu^Please Select a Holster Option for your %z:|Long Gun Holster|Automatic Rifle Holster|Small Revolver Holster|Large Revolver Holster|Pistol Holster|Katana Sheath|Machete Sheath|Knife Sheath|.357 Magnum Holster|Broad Machete Sheath|Force No Visible Holster|Default|Cancel" svCEWeapName else MessageBoxEx "You must have a weapon equipped to choose a visible holster option - Armed to the Teeth" endif endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1.c) Shishkebab Backpack ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval !(iBPEquipped)
if eval (rHkLSWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkRSWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkLHWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkRHWeap == WeapShishkebab) Player.AddItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 1 1 Player.EquipItemAlt QSATTTShishkebabBP 0 1 elseif eval (QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iGRAInstalled && IsFormValid refGRAShishkebab && (rHkLSWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkRSWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkLHWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkRHWeap == refGRAShishkebab)) Player.AddItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 1 1 Player.EquipItemAlt QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 0 1 endif
elseif eval rCEBackpack== QSATTTShishkebabBP
if eval (rHkLSWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkRSWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkLHWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkRHWeap != WeapShishkebab) Player.UnequipItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 0 1 Player.RemoveItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 1 1 endif
elseif eval rCEBackpack== QSATTTShishkebabGRABP
if eval (rHkLSWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkRSWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkLHWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkRHWeap != refGRAShishkebab) Player.UnequipItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 0 1 Player.RemoveItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 1 1 endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2) Change Detection and Reaction Execution ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.a) Weapon Change & Other Checks ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval rWeapPrev != rWeapCur || rHkLSWeap != rHkLSWeapPrev || rHkRSWeap != rHkRSWeapPrev || rHkLHWeap != rHkLHWeapPrev || rHkRHWeap != rHkRHWeapPrev || (rGrenCur != rGrenPrev && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM)
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval iLSModFlags != iLSModFlagsPrev || iRSModFlags != iRSModFlagsPrev || iLHModFlags != iLHModFlagsPrev || iRHModFlags != iRHModFlagsPrev || iRestarted || iModWasDisabled
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval (QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM != iHolstersMCMPrev) || (QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps != iLoweredWeapsPrev) || iHolsterChange || iGameLoaded
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval iBit5Prev != iBit5 || iBPEquippedPrev != iBPEquipped || iRSIs2HMeleePrev != iRSIs2HMelee || iWeapFlagsBPPrev != iWeapFlagsBP
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM Call QSATTTDetachUDF else Call QSATTTPositioningUDF endif
elseif eval iGrenadeSideMCM != QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM
Call QSATTTPositioningUDF let iGrenadeSideMCM := QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide
elseif eval (iWeapFlagsBP != iWeapFlagsBPPrev) || (avLSNodePos[0] == 0 && avLSNodePos[1] == 0 && avLSNodePos[2] == 0)
Call QSATTTPositioningUDF
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 3) Hiding Grenade if you don't have any in your inventory ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iGrenCountReset if iGrenCountWasZero Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 1 1 else Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 0 1 endif set iGrenCountReset to 0 endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 4) Re Equipping Current Weapon if it's animation has changed ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur && Player.IsWeaponOut == 0 ;anims only need to be reset if the weapon is equipped & on player's body
if rWeapPrev == rWeapCur
if iCEisHKWeap != iCEisHKWeapPrev
if iCEisHKWeapPrev == 0 if eval iCEisHKWeap == 2 && (iWeapTypeCur == 2 || iWeapTypeCur == 5 || iWeapTypeCur == 6 || iWeapTypeCur == 7) elseif eval iCEisHKWeap == 3 && (iWeapTypeCur == 1) elseif eval iCEisHKWeap == 4 && (iWeapTypeCur == 3 || iWeapTypeCur == 4) else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif elseif iCEisHKWeap == 0 if eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 2 && (iWeapTypeCur == 2 || iWeapTypeCur == 5 || iWeapTypeCur == 6 || iWeapTypeCur == 7) elseif eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 3 && (iWeapTypeCur == 1) elseif eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 4 && (iWeapTypeCur == 3 || iWeapTypeCur == 4) else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif
endif
if iUnEqEq == 0
if eval iBPEquipped && iBPEquippedPrev == iBPEquipped elseif eval iBPEquippedPrev != iBPEquipped || iBit5Prev != iBit5 || iRSIs2HMeleePrev != iRSIs2HMelee Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif endif endif
if eval !(iUnEqEq) && iRestarted && iBPEquipped && ((rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap || rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap) || ((iWeapTypeCur == 5 ||iWeapTypeCur == 6 iWeapTypeCur == 2) && (rWeapCur != rHkLHWeap || rWeapCur != rHkRHWeap))) Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 elseif eval !(iUnEqEq) && QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps != iLoweredWeapsPrev && ((rWeapCur == rHkLHWeap || rWeapCur == rHkRHWeap) || (iWeapTypeCur == 3 && (rWeapCur != rHkLSWeap || rWeapCur != rHkRSWeap))) Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 endif
endif
if eval (IsFormValid refGRAKatana) && rWeapCur == refGRAKatana && (rHkLSWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkRSWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkLHWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkRHWeap == refGRAKatana)
Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack" 0 1 1
endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 6) Variable memory ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
let rWeapPrev := rWeapCur set iWeapTypePrev to iWeapTypeCur set iCEisHKWeapPrev to iCEisHKWeap
let rHkLSWeapPrev := rHkLSWeap let rHkRSWeapPrev := rHkRSWeap let rHkLHWeapPrev := rHkLHWeap let rHkRHWeapPrev := rHkRHWeap
let iLSModFlagsPrev := iLSModFlags let iRSModFlagsPrev := iRSModFlags let iLHModFlagsPrev := iLHModFlags let iRHModFlagsPrev := iRHModFlags let rGrenPrev := rGrenCur
set iHolstersMCMPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM set iShowGrenadeMCMPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM set iLoweredWeapsPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
set iBit5Prev to iBit5 set iBPEquippedPrev to iBPEquipped set iRSIs2HMeleePrev to iRSIs2HMelee set iWeapFlagsBPPrev to iWeapFlagsBP set iUnEqEq to 0
set iMainQuestRun to 0 set iRestarted to 0 set iGameLoaded to 0 set iModWasDisabled to 0 set iHolsterChange to 0 else if iModWasDisabled == 0 Call QSATTTDetachUDF endif set iModWasDisabled to 1 endif
;The End
ESP.TRADUIT:
Scn QSATTTMainS
ref rWeapCur ref rWeapPrev
ref rCEArmor ref rCEBackpack
ref rHkLSWeap ref rHkRSWeap ref rHkLHWeap ref rHkRHWeap ref rGrenCur ref rHkLSWeapPrev ref rHkRSWeapPrev ref rHkLHWeapPrev ref rHkRHWeapPrev ref rGrenPrev
ref refJWHQuest ref refQTQuestRef ref refGRAShishkebab ref refGRAKatana
int iWeapTypeCur int iWeapTypePrev int iHkLSWeapType int iHkRSWeapType int iHkLHWeapType int iHkRHWeapType int iGrenType
int iLSModFlags int iRSModFlags int iLHModFlags int iRHModFlags int iLSModFlagsPrev int iRSModFlagsPrev int iLHModFlagsPrev int iRHModFlagsPrev
int iGrenCountWasZero int iGrenCountReset
int iWeapFlagsBP int iWeapFlagsBPPrev int iBit5 int iBit5Prev int iBPEquipped int iBPEquippedPrev int iRSIs2HMelee int iRSIs2HMeleePrev int iCEisHKWeap int iCEisHKWeapPrev int iUnEqEq
int iHolstersMCMPrev int iShowGrenadeMCMPrev int iGrenadeSideMCM int iLoweredWeapsPrev
int iMainQuestRun int iMCMAnimChange int iRestarted int iModWasDisabled int iHolsterChange int iGameLoadedDetach int iGameLoaded
string_var svCEWeapName
array_var avLSNodePos array_var avJWHWeapArray
Begin Gamemode
if GetGameRestarted set iRestarted to 1 if GetGameLoaded endif elseif GetGameLoaded set iGameLoadedDetach to 1 Call QSATTTDetachUDF set iGameLoadedDetach to 0 set iGameLoaded to 1 endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1) Variable Collection ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch == 0
let rWeapCur := Player.GetEquippedObject 5 let rCEArmor := Player.GetEquippedObject 2 set rCEBackpack to Player.GetEquippedObject 7 let avLSNodePos := Player.GetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 0 1 let iBPEquipped := (IsFormValid rCEBackpack)
if IsFormValid rCEArmor
let iBit5 := GetBit (GetEquipmentBipedMask rCEArmor), 5 ;PowerArmor
if eval !(iBit5) let iBit5 := GetBit (GetEquipmentBipedMask rCEArmor), 2 ;HasBackpack endif
else let iBit5 := 0 endif
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys
let avJWHWeapArray := GetArrayVariable "aItem", refJWHQuest
if avJWHWeapArray == ar_Null let avJWHWeapArray := Ar_List 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 endif
endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice ;Getting the Left Shoulder weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkLSWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1] else let rHkLSWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkLSWeap && GetType rHkLSWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkLSWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iLSModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkLSWeap) else let iLSModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkLSWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkLSWeap
else set iHkLSWeapType to 0 let iLSModFlags := 0 let rHkLSWeap := 0 endif
else set iHkLSWeapType to 0 let iLSModFlags := 0 let rHkLSWeap := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice ;Getting the Right Shoulder weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkRSWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2] else let rHkRSWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkRSWeap && GetType rHkRSWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkRSWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iRSModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkRSWeap) else let iRSModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkRSWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkRSWeap
else set iHkRSWeapType to 0 let iRSModFlags := 0 let rHkRSWeap := 0 endif else set iHkRSWeapType to 0 let rHkRSWeap := 0 let iRSModFlags := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3MCMChoice ;Getting the Left Hip weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkLHWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3] else let rHkLHWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkLHWeap && GetType rHkLHWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkLHWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iLHModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkLHWeap) else let iLHModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkLHWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkLHWeap
else set iHkLHWeapType to 0 let iLHModFlags := 0 let rHkLHWeap := 0 endif else set iHkLHWeapType to 0 let iLHModFlags := 0 let rHkLHWeap := 0 endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4MCMChoice ;Getting the Right Hip weapon reference
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let rHkRHWeap := avJWHWeapArray[QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4] else let rHkRHWeap := GetHotkeyItem QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 endif
if eval IsFormValid rHkRHWeap && GetType rHkRHWeap == 40 && Player.GetItemCount rHkRHWeap > 0
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iJWHInstalled == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys let iRHModFlags := (Call QSBaseRefToModFlags rHkRHWeap) else let iRHModFlags := ((GetHotkeyItemRef QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4).GetWeaponRefModFlags) endif
set iHkRHWeapType to GetWeaponType rHkRHWeap
else set iHkRHWeapType to 0 let iRHModFlags := 0 let rHkRHWeap := 0 endif else set iHkRHWeapType to 0 let iRHModFlags := 0 let rHkRHWeap := 0 endif
if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur ;Bunch of checks if we have a weapon equipped currently
set iWeapFlagsBP to GetBit (GetWeaponFlags1 rWeapCur), 4 ;'Hide Backpack' flag, eg. Mingun, Gatling laser, Shishkebab set iWeapTypeCur to GetWeaponType rWeapCur
if eval rWeapCur != rHkLSWeap && rWeapCur != rHkLHWeap && rWeapCur != rHkRHWeap ;if the right weapon is 2 hand melee it affects weapon positions & animations, so it needs to be checked: if iWeapTypeCur == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 elseif eval iHkRSWeapType == 2 && iWeapTypeCur != 5 && iWeapTypeCur != 6 && iWeapTypeCur != 7 && iWeapTypeCur != 9 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif elseif iHkRSWeapType == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif
if rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap ;we sometimes need to check if the current weapon is a hotkey weapon, not a fun to do lots of times, so it's done here once and the var is set set iCEisHKWeap to 1 elseif rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 2 elseif rWeapCur == rHkLHWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 3 elseif rWeapCur == rHkRHWeap set iCEisHKWeap to 4 else set iCEisHKWeap to 0 endif
else if iHkRSWeapType == 2 Set iRSIs2HMelee to 1 else Set iRSIs2HMelee to 0 endif set iCEisHKWeap to 0 set iWeapTypeCur to 0 set iWeapFlagsBP to 0 endif
if eval IsFormValid rGrenCur
if eval Player.GetItemCount rGrenCur == 0 || (rGrenCur == rWeapCur && Player.GetItemCount rGrenCur == 1) ;Snippet to figure out if the grenade weapon should be displayed based on current amount in player's inventory
if iGrenCountWasZero == 0 let iGrenCountReset := 1 let iGrenCountWasZero := 1 endif
elseif iGrenCountWasZero
let iGrenCountWasZero := 0 let iGrenCountReset := 1
endif endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1.b) Grenade Select detection & Holster menu hotkey ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM
if eval QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iQuickThrowLoaded == 1 && IsFormValid refQTQuestRef
set rGrenCur to GetRefVariable "rCurrentWeap", refQTQuestRef set iGrenType to GetWeaponType rGrenCur
elseif IsKeyPressed QSMCMVarsQuest.GrenadeKey == 1 if IsFormValid rWeapCur if iWeapTypeCur > 9 if rWeapCur != rGrenPrev PlaySound WPNGrenadeFragUnequip let rGrenCur := Player.GetEquippedObject 5 set iGrenType to GetWeaponType rWeapCur endif endif else set rWeapCur to 0 set iGrenType to 0 playsound WPNGrenadeFragUnequip endif endif else set rGrenCur to 0 set iGrenType to 0 endif
if eval IsKeyPressed QSMCMVarsQuest.HolsterKey == 1 && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur && GetType rWeapCur == 40 && iWeapTypeCur != 0 && iWeapTypeCur < 8 let svCEWeapName := GetName rWeapCur MessageBoxExAlt QSATTTHolsterMsgUDF "^ATTT Weapon Holster Menu^Please Select a Holster Option for your %z:|Long Gun Holster|Automatic Rifle Holster|Small Revolver Holster|Large Revolver Holster|Pistol Holster|Katana Sheath|Machete Sheath|Knife Sheath|.357 Magnum Holster|Broad Machete Sheath|Force No Visible Holster|Default|Cancel" svCEWeapName else MessageBoxEx "你必须有一个武器装备选择一个可见的枪套选项 - 武装到牙齿" endif endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1.c) Shishkebab Backpack ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval !(iBPEquipped)
if eval (rHkLSWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkRSWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkLHWeap == WeapShishkebab || rHkRHWeap == WeapShishkebab) Player.AddItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 1 1 Player.EquipItemAlt QSATTTShishkebabBP 0 1 elseif eval (QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iGRAInstalled && IsFormValid refGRAShishkebab && (rHkLSWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkRSWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkLHWeap == refGRAShishkebab || rHkRHWeap == refGRAShishkebab)) Player.AddItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 1 1 Player.EquipItemAlt QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 0 1 endif
elseif eval rCEBackpack== QSATTTShishkebabBP
if eval (rHkLSWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkRSWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkLHWeap != WeapShishkebab && rHkRHWeap != WeapShishkebab) Player.UnequipItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 0 1 Player.RemoveItem QSATTTShishkebabBP 1 1 endif
elseif eval rCEBackpack== QSATTTShishkebabGRABP
if eval (rHkLSWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkRSWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkLHWeap != refGRAShishkebab && rHkRHWeap != refGRAShishkebab) Player.UnequipItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 0 1 Player.RemoveItem QSATTTShishkebabGRABP 1 1 endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2) Change Detection and Reaction Execution ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.a) Weapon Change & Other Checks ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval rWeapPrev != rWeapCur || rHkLSWeap != rHkLSWeapPrev || rHkRSWeap != rHkRSWeapPrev || rHkLHWeap != rHkLHWeapPrev || rHkRHWeap != rHkRHWeapPrev || (rGrenCur != rGrenPrev && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM)
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval iLSModFlags != iLSModFlagsPrev || iRSModFlags != iRSModFlagsPrev || iLHModFlags != iLHModFlagsPrev || iRHModFlags != iRHModFlagsPrev || iRestarted || iModWasDisabled
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval (QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM != iHolstersMCMPrev) || (QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps != iLoweredWeapsPrev) || iHolsterChange || iGameLoaded
Call QSATTTDetachUDF
elseif eval iBit5Prev != iBit5 || iBPEquippedPrev != iBPEquipped || iRSIs2HMeleePrev != iRSIs2HMelee || iWeapFlagsBPPrev != iWeapFlagsBP
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM Call QSATTTDetachUDF else Call QSATTTPositioningUDF endif
elseif eval iGrenadeSideMCM != QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide && QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM
Call QSATTTPositioningUDF let iGrenadeSideMCM := QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide
elseif eval (iWeapFlagsBP != iWeapFlagsBPPrev) || (avLSNodePos[0] == 0 && avLSNodePos[1] == 0 && avLSNodePos[2] == 0)
Call QSATTTPositioningUDF
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 3) Hiding Grenade if you don't have any in your inventory ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iGrenCountReset if iGrenCountWasZero Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 1 1 else Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 0 1 endif set iGrenCountReset to 0 endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 4) Re Equipping Current Weapon if it's animation has changed ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rWeapCur && Player.IsWeaponOut == 0 ;anims only need to be reset if the weapon is equipped & on player's body
if rWeapPrev == rWeapCur
if iCEisHKWeap != iCEisHKWeapPrev
if iCEisHKWeapPrev == 0 if eval iCEisHKWeap == 2 && (iWeapTypeCur == 2 || iWeapTypeCur == 5 || iWeapTypeCur == 6 || iWeapTypeCur == 7) elseif eval iCEisHKWeap == 3 && (iWeapTypeCur == 1) elseif eval iCEisHKWeap == 4 && (iWeapTypeCur == 3 || iWeapTypeCur == 4) else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif elseif iCEisHKWeap == 0 if eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 2 && (iWeapTypeCur == 2 || iWeapTypeCur == 5 || iWeapTypeCur == 6 || iWeapTypeCur == 7) elseif eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 3 && (iWeapTypeCur == 1) elseif eval iCEisHKWeapPrev == 4 && (iWeapTypeCur == 3 || iWeapTypeCur == 4) else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif else Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif
endif
if iUnEqEq == 0
if eval iBPEquipped && iBPEquippedPrev == iBPEquipped elseif eval iBPEquippedPrev != iBPEquipped || iBit5Prev != iBit5 || iRSIs2HMeleePrev != iRSIs2HMelee Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 set iUnEqEq to 1 endif endif endif
if eval !(iUnEqEq) && iRestarted && iBPEquipped && ((rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap || rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap) || ((iWeapTypeCur == 5 ||iWeapTypeCur == 6 iWeapTypeCur == 2) && (rWeapCur != rHkLHWeap || rWeapCur != rHkRHWeap))) Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 elseif eval !(iUnEqEq) && QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps != iLoweredWeapsPrev && ((rWeapCur == rHkLHWeap || rWeapCur == rHkRHWeap) || (iWeapTypeCur == 3 && (rWeapCur != rHkLSWeap || rWeapCur != rHkRSWeap))) Player.UnequipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 Player.EquipItemAlt rWeapCur 0 1 endif
endif
if eval (IsFormValid refGRAKatana) && rWeapCur == refGRAKatana && (rHkLSWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkRSWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkLHWeap == refGRAKatana || rHkRHWeap == refGRAKatana)
Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack" 0 1 1
endif ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 6) Variable memory ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
let rWeapPrev := rWeapCur set iWeapTypePrev to iWeapTypeCur set iCEisHKWeapPrev to iCEisHKWeap
let rHkLSWeapPrev := rHkLSWeap let rHkRSWeapPrev := rHkRSWeap let rHkLHWeapPrev := rHkLHWeap let rHkRHWeapPrev := rHkRHWeap
let iLSModFlagsPrev := iLSModFlags let iRSModFlagsPrev := iRSModFlags let iLHModFlagsPrev := iLHModFlags let iRHModFlagsPrev := iRHModFlags let rGrenPrev := rGrenCur
set iHolstersMCMPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM set iShowGrenadeMCMPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM set iLoweredWeapsPrev to QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
set iBit5Prev to iBit5 set iBPEquippedPrev to iBPEquipped set iRSIs2HMeleePrev to iRSIs2HMelee set iWeapFlagsBPPrev to iWeapFlagsBP set iUnEqEq to 0
set iMainQuestRun to 0 set iRestarted to 0 set iGameLoaded to 0 set iModWasDisabled to 0 set iHolsterChange to 0 else if iModWasDisabled == 0 Call QSATTTDetachUDF endif set iModWasDisabled to 1 endif
;The End

scn QSMCMScript
short iMaster short iMouseover short iOption short iTemp short iTemp1 short iTemp2 short iTemp3 short iTemp4 short iTemp5 short iTemp6 short iTemp7 short bTemp float fTemp float fValue reference rList
begin GameMode if GetGameRestarted if IsModLoaded "The Mod Configuration Menu.esp" set iMaster to GetModIndex "The Mod Configuration Menu.esp" set rList to BuildRef iMaster 2790 ListAddForm rList QSMCMMenu endif endif end
begin MenuMode 1013 if IsModLoaded "The Mod Configuration Menu.esp" else Return endif
if GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_ActiveMod" == GetModIndex "ArmedToTheTeethNV-Redux.esp" set iOption to GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_ActiveOption" set fValue to GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Value"
if GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Reset" ;1 - RESET SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Reset" 0
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/_columns" 2
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_textOff" "Enabled" SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_textOn" "Disabled" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_altFont" 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_title" "Mod Master Switch" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_type" 6 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:1/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch == 0 set bTemp to 250 else set bTemp to 120 endif
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:5/_enable" 1 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:5/_altFont" 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:5/_title" "Grenade Options" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:5/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:5/_type" 7
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_title" "Show Grenade" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:7/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM
set iTemp6 to 2 - QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_enable" iTemp6 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_textOff" "Right" SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_textOn" "Left" SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_title" "Grenade Position" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_type" 6 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:8/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide
set iTemp5 to 1 + QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iQuickThrowLoaded SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/_enable" iTemp5 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/_title" "Grenade Key" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/_type" 3 SetUIStringEx "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:9/value/*:1/string" "%k" QSMCMVarsQuest.GrenadeKey ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:13/_enable" 1 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:13/_altFont" 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:13/_title" "Weapon Options" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:13/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:13/_type" 7
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_title" "Left Shoulder Weapon" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:15/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice
set iTemp1 to 2 - QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/_enable" iTemp1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/_title" "Hotkey" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/_type" 1 if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "1" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 2 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "2" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "3" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 4 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "4" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 5 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "5" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 6 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "6" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 7 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "7" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 == 8 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:16/value/*:1/string" "8" endif
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_title" "Right Shoulder Weapon" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:17/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice
set iTemp2 to 2 - QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/_enable" iTemp2 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/_title" "Hotkey" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/_type" 1 if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "1" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 2 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "2" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "3" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 4 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "4" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 5 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "5" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 6 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "6" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 7 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "7" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 == 8 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:18/value/*:1/string" "8" endif
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_title" "Left Hip Weapon" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:19/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3MCMChoice
set iTemp3 to 2 - QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3MCMChoice SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/_enable" iTemp3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/_title" "Hotkey" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/_type" 1 if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "1" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 2 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "2" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "3" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 4 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "4" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 5 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "5" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 6 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "6" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 7 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "7" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 == 8 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:20/value/*:1/string" "8" endif
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_title" "Right Hip Weapon" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:21/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4MCMChoice
set iTemp4 to 2 - QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4MCMChoice SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/_enable" iTemp4 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/_title" "Hotkey" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/_type" 1 if QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "1" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 2 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "2" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "3" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 4 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "4" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 5 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "5" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 6 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "6" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 7 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "7" elseif QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 == 8 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:22/value/*:1/string" "8" endif
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:25/_enable" 1 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:25/_altFont" 3 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:25/_title" "Misc Options" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:25/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:25/_type" 7
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_title" "Visible Holsters" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:27/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:28/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:28/_title" "Holster Menu Key" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:28/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:28/_type" 3 SetUIStringEx "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:28/value/*:1/string" "%k" QSMCMVarsQuest.HolsterKey
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_title" "Lowered Pistol Positions" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_indent" 1.5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:29/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:30/_enable" 1 SetUIString "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:30/_title" "Use JAM/JWH Hotkeys" SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:30/_brightness" bTemp SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:30/_type" 5 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/*:1/*:30/_value" QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys
elseif GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Default" ;2 - DEFAULT SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Default" 0 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Reset" 1
set QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch to 1
set QSMCMVarsQuest.GrenadeKey to 23 set QSMCMVarsQuest.HolsterKey to 24 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2 to 3 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3 to 4 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4 to 5 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey3MCMChoice to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey4MCMChoice to 1
set QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM to 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps to 0 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iUseJWHHotkeys to 0
set QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide to 0
elseif GetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_NewValue" ;3 - NEW VALUE SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_NewValue" 0 SetUIFloat "StartMenu/MCM/_Reset" 1
if iOption == 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch to fValue
elseif iOption == 7 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM to fValue
elseif iOption == 8 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide to fValue
elseif iOption == 9 set QSMCMVarsQuest.GrenadeKey to fValue
elseif iOption == 15 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1MCMChoice to fValue
elseif iOption == 16 if fValue == 1 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 1 elseif fValue == 2 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 2 elseif fValue == 3 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 3 elseif fValue == 4 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 4 elseif fValue == 5 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 5 elseif fValue == 6 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 6 elseif fValue == 7 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 7 elseif fValue == 8 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey1 to 8 endif
elseif iOption == 17 set QSMCMVarsQuest.iHKey2MCMChoice to fValue

scn QSBaseRefToModFlags
int iIndex int iMods int iModsCurrTotal int iModsMax int iModFlags
ref refHKWeap array_var arHKWInvRefs
Begin Function { refHKWeap }
let arHKWInvRefs := Player.GetInvRefsForItem refHKWeap iIndex = Ar_Size arHKWInvRefs
while iIndex > 0 iIndex -= 1
if eval (Ar_HasKey arHKWInvRefs iIndex) == 0 continue endif
let iMods := arHKWInvRefs[iIndex].GetWeaponRefModFlags let iModsCurrTotal := ((GetBit iMods, 0) + (GetBit iMods, 1) + (GetBit iMods, 2))
if iModsCurrTotal >= iModsMax let iModFlags := iMods let iModsMax := iModsCurrTotal endif
loop
SetFunctionValue iModFlags
End
