Scn QSATTTDetachUDF
array_var aFilePaths string_var sHkLSFP string_var sHkRSFP string_var sHkLHFP string_var sHkRHFP string_var sGrenadeFP
string_var sCEHolsterFP string_var sLSHolsterFP string_var sRSHolsterFP string_var sLHHolsterFP string_var sRHHolsterFP string_var sCENode string_var sLHNode string_var sRHNode
Begin Function {}
if eval !(GetGameRestarted) let aFilePaths := AuxVarGetAsArr "*_QSATTTPlayerWeaps" Player endif
if eval aFilePaths && (Ar_Size aFilePaths) == 13 let sHkLSFP := aFilePaths[0] let sHkRSFP := aFilePaths[1] let sHkLHFP := aFilePaths[2] let sHkRHFP := aFilePaths[3] let sGrenadeFP := aFilePaths[4] let sCEHolsterFP := aFilePaths[5] let sLSHolsterFP := aFilePaths[6] let sRSHolsterFP := aFilePaths[7] let sLHHolsterFP := aFilePaths[8] let sRHHolsterFP := aFilePaths[9] let sCENode := aFilePaths[10] let sLHNode := aFilePaths[11] let sRHNode := aFilePaths[12]
if eval sHkLSFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "ATTT Node LS|*_ATTTLS*%z" sHkLSFP endif if eval sHkRSFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "ATTT Node RS|*_ATTTRS*%z" sHkRSFP endif if eval sLHNode != "" && sHkLHFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "%z|*_ATTTLH*%z" sLHNode sHkLHFP endif if eval sRHNode != "" && sHkRHFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "%z|*_ATTTRH*%z" sRHNode sHkRHFP endif if eval sGrenadeFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "ATTT Node RHGren|*_ATTT*%z" sGrenadeFP endif if eval sCENode != "" && sCEHolsterFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "%z|%z" sCENode sCEHolsterFP endif if eval sLSHolsterFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "ATTT Node LS|%z" sLSHolsterFP endif if eval sRSHolsterFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "ATTT Node RS|%z" sRSHolsterFP endif if eval sLHNode != "" && sLHHolsterFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "%z|%z" sLHNode sLHHolsterFP endif if eval sRHNode != "" && sRHHolsterFP != "" AttachModel Player 2 "%z|%z" sRHNode sRHHolsterFP endif endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iMasterSwitch == 0 && QSATTTMainQ.iGameLoadedDetach == 0 Call QSATTTAttachUDF endif
End
#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left shoulder slot
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left shoulder slot" sErrorMsgWeapType

ESP.ORIGINAL: #0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right shoulder slot
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right shoulder slot" sErrorMsgWeapType

ESP.ORIGINAL: #0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left hip slot
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left hip slot" sErrorMsgWeapType

ESP.ORIGINAL: #0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right hip slot
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right hip slot" sErrorMsgWeapType

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn QSATTTAttachUDF
ref rHkLSWeap ref rHkRSWeap ref rHkLHWeap ref rHkRHWeap ref rGrenCur ref rWeapCur
int iBPEquipped
array_var aFilePaths
string_var sHkLSFP string_var sHkRSFP string_var sHkLHFP string_var sHkRHFP string_var sGrenadeFP
string_var sLHNode string_var sRHNode
string_var sErrorMsgWeapType
string_var sCENode string_var sCEHolsterFP string_var sLSHolsterFP string_var sRSHolsterFP string_var sLHHolsterFP string_var sRHHolsterFP
Begin Function {} ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 1) Weapon Showing Conditions & Attaching if Appropriate ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set rWeapCur to QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur let rHkLSWeap := QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap let rHkRSWeap := QSATTTMainQ.rHkRSWeap let rHkLHWeap := QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap let rHkRHWeap := QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap
if QSATTTMainQ.iWeapFlagsBP || QSATTTMainQ.iBPEquipped set iBPEquipped to 1 else set iBPEquipped to 0 endif
if eval QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType != 1 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType != 2 let sLHNode := "ATTT Node LHL" else let sLHNode := "ATTT Node LH" endif
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType != 1 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType != 2 let sRHNode := "ATTT Node RHL" else let sRHNode := "ATTT Node RH" endif
else let sLHNode := "ATTT Node LH" let sRHNode := "ATTT Node RH" endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.a) Left Shoulder ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rHkLSWeap && rWeapCur != rHkLSWeap if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType != 0 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType < 8 ;0 = Unarmed, anything above 8 is launchers, 2handhandle mines, and throwables
if eval !(FileExists ("meshes\" + $(GetWeaponModel rHkLSWeap QSATTTMainQ.iLSModFlags))) let sHkLSFP := GetWeaponModel rHkLSWeap 0 else let sHkLSFP := GetWeaponModel rHkLSWeap QSATTTMainQ.iLSModFlags endif
if eval sHkLSFP != "" AttachModel Player 3 "ATTT Node LS|*_ATTTLS*%z" sHkLSFP endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM let sLSHolsterFP := Call QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath rHkLSWeap if eval sLSHolsterFP == "" else if eval iBPEquipped if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 1 let sLSHolsterFP := $sLSHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sLSHolsterFP := $sLSHolsterFP + ".nif" endif elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iBit5 let sLSHolsterFP := $sLSHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sLSHolsterFP := $sLSHolsterFP + ".nif" endif AttachModel Player 3 "ATTT Node LS|%z" sLSHolsterFP endif endif
else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 0 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Unarmed" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 8 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "2 Hand Carry" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 9 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Launcher" else let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Throwable" endif MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left shoulder slot" sErrorMsgWeapType endif endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.b) Right Shoulder ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rHkRSWeap && rWeapCur != rHkRSWeap
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 2 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 5 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 7 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 6 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 9 elseif eval (QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType != 0 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType < 8) || QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 9
if eval !(FileExists ("meshes\" + $(GetWeaponModel rHkRSWeap QSATTTMainQ.iRSModFlags))) let sHkRSFP := GetWeaponModel rHkRSWeap 0 else let sHkRSFP := GetWeaponModel rHkRSWeap QSATTTMainQ.iRSModFlags endif
if eval sHkRSFP != "" AttachModel Player 3 "ATTT Node RS|*_ATTTRS*%z" sHkRSFP endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM let sRSHolsterFP := Call QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath rHkRSWeap if eval sRSHolsterFP == "" else if eval iBPEquipped if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 6 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 5 let sRSHolsterFP := $sRSHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sRSHolsterFP := $sRSHolsterFP + ".nif" endif
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iBit5 if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 1 let sRSHolsterFP := $sRSHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sRSHolsterFP := $sRSHolsterFP + ".nif" endif else let sRSHolsterFP := $sRSHolsterFP + ".nif" endif AttachModel Player 3 "ATTT Node RS|%z" sRSHolsterFP endif endif
else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 0 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Unarmed" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType == 8 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "2 Hand Carry" else let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Throwable" endif MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right shoulder slot" sErrorMsgWeapType endif endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.c) Left Hip ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rHkLHWeap && rWeapCur != rHkLHWeap
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType != 0 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType < 8
if eval !(FileExists ("meshes\" + $(GetWeaponModel rHkLHWeap QSATTTMainQ.iLHModFlags))) let sHkLHFP := GetWeaponModel rHkLHWeap 0 else let sHkLHFP := GetWeaponModel rHkLHWeap QSATTTMainQ.iLHModFlags endif
if eval sHkLHFP != "" AttachModel Player 3 "%z|*_ATTTLH*%z" sLHNode sHkLHFP endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM let sLHHolsterFP := Call QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath rHkLHWeap if eval sLHHolsterFP == "" else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType != 1 let sLHHolsterFP := sLHHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sLHHolsterFP := sLHHolsterFP + ".nif" endif AttachModel Player 3 "%z|%z" sLHNode sLHHolsterFP endif endif
else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType == 0 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Unarmed" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType == 8 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "2 Hand Carry" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType == 9 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Launcher" else let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Throwable" endif MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the left hip slot" sErrorMsgWeapType endif endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 2.d) Right Hip ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval IsFormValid rHkRHWeap && rWeapCur != rHkRHWeap
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 3 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 4 && !(QSATTTMainQ.iCEisHKWeap) elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType != 0 && QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType < 8
if eval !(FileExists ("meshes\" + $(GetWeaponModel rHkRHWeap QSATTTMainQ.iRHModFlags))) let sHkRHFP := GetWeaponModel rHkRHWeap 0 else let sHkRHFP := GetWeaponModel rHkRHWeap QSATTTMainQ.iRHModFlags endif
if eval sHkRHFP != "" AttachModel Player 3 "%z|*_ATTTRH*%z" sRHNode sHkRHFP endif
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM let sRHHolsterFP := Call QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath rHkRHWeap if eval sRHHolsterFP == "" else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType == 1 let sRHHolsterFP := sRHHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sRHHolsterFP := sRHHolsterFP + ".nif" endif AttachModel Player 3 "%z|%z" sRHNode sRHHolsterFP endif endif
else if QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType == 0 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Unarmed" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType == 8 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "2 Hand Carry" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType == 9 let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Launcher" else let sErrorMsgWeapType := "Throwable" endif MessageExAlt 3 "#0|Armed to the Teeth cannot display %z weapons in the right hip slot" sErrorMsgWeapType endif endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 3) Current Equipped Holster ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowVisibleHolstersMCM
if rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap let sCENode := "ATTT Node LS" elseif rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap let sCENode := "ATTT Node RS" elseif rWeapCur == rHkLHWeap let sCENode := sLHNode elseif rWeapCur == rHkRHWeap let sCENode := sRHNode elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 5 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 6 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 2 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 7 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 9 let sCENode := "ATTT Node RS" elseif QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 4 let sCENode := sRHNode elseif QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1 let sCENode := "ATTT Node LH" else let sCENode := "" endif
let sCEHolsterFP := Call QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath rWeapCur
if eval sCEHolsterFP == "" || sCENode == "" else
if eval (sCENode == "ATTT Node LH" || sCENode == "ATTT Node LHL") && QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur != 1
let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif"
elseif iBPEquipped ;wearing backpack
if eval (QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1) && rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" elseif (QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 5 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 6) && rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + ".nif" endif
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iBit5 ;wearing power armor
if eval (QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1) && (rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap || rWeapCur == rHkRSWeap) let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" elseif (QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 5 || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 6) && rWeapCur == rHkLSWeap let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + ".nif" endif elseif eval sCENode == "ATTT Node RH" && QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1 let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + "-Left.nif" else let sCEHolsterFP := $sCEHolsterFP + ".nif" endif
AttachModel Player 3 "%z|%z" sCENode sCEHolsterFP endif
endif
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 4) Showing Nade ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iShowGrenadeMCM let rGrenCur := QSATTTMainQ.rGrenCur if IsFormValid rGrenCur if IsFormValid rGrenCur if eval FileExists ("meshes\" + $(GetWeaponWorldModelPath rGrenCur)) let sGrenadeFP := GetWeaponWorldModelPath rGrenCur else let sGrenadeFP := GetWeaponModel rGrenCur 0 endif endif
if eval sGrenadeFP != "" AttachModel Player 3 "ATTT Node RHGren|*_ATTT*%z" sGrenadeFP endif endif endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
let aFilePaths := Ar_List sHkLSFP, sHkRSFP, sHkLHFP, sHkRHFP, sGrenadeFP, sCEHolsterFP, sLSHolsterFP, sRSHolsterFP, sLHHolsterFP, sRHHolsterFP, sCENode, sLHNode, sRHNode AuxVarSetFromArr "*_QSATTTPlayerWeaps" aFilePaths Player Call QSATTTPositioningUDF
;The End

SCN QSATTTPositioningUDF
ref rCEBackpack int iRSWeapType int iLHWeapType int iRHWeapType
Begin Function {}
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Left Shoulder: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set rCEBackpack to QSATTTMainQ.rCEBackpack
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iBPEquipped || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapFlagsBP ;if backpack biped slot is used, or if weapon has hide backpack checked (minigun, gatling, etc.)
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 20 -14 14 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 0 0 -94 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 15 -15.9 13.4 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 180 1.6 -89.1 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 4
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 7.1 -20.8 13.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" -170 -2.6 189.5 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 11 -11 13.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 0 -1.6 178.5 0 1
endif
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iBit5 ;if wearing Power Armor
if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 2 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -16 -19 -6 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 90 2 121 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 4
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -11 -18 2.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 95 7 56 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -14 -19 -1 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 98 2 31 0 1
endif
elseif QSATTTMainQ.iRSIs2HMelee
if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -20 -14 -2.2 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 92 5.3 114 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -16 -13.2 -4.6 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 93 0 115.6 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 3 || QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 4
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -11 -13 2.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 95 7 56 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" -14 -13.3 2.8 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" 103 2 26.9 0 1
endif
else
if QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 21 -11 -2 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" -90 -6 297 0 1
elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iHkLSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 21 -11 -2 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" -90 -6 -63 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LS" 21 -11 4 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LS" -90 -6 -162 0 1
endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Right Shoulder: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 2 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap set iRSWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 5 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap set iRSWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 7 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap set iRSWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 6 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap set iRSWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur else set iRSWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iHkRSWeapType endif
if QSATTTMainQ.iBPEquipped || QSATTTMainQ.iWeapFlagsBP
if eval iRSWeapType == 2 ;Is wearing Backpack
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 20 -14 -14 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 0 0 -94 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 15 -15.9 -13.4 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 180 -1.6 -89.1 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 3 || iRSWeapType == 4
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 7.1 -20.8 -13.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 170 2.6 189.5 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 9
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 5.36 -11.68 -8.99 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 174.97 37.44 100.21 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 11 -11 -13.5 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 0 1.6 178.5 0 1
endif
elseif QSATTTMainQ.iBit5 ;PA
if eval iRSWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 16.9 -14.4 4.4 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 67 -158.1 66.7 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" -9 -20.2 -13 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" -86 173 -62 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 6
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 0.6 -16.5 -14.32 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" -96.61 -11.7 -28.32 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 3 || iRSWeapType == 4
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" -10 -18 -10 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 83 7 59 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 9
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 5.36 -11.68 -8.99 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 174.97 37.44 100.21 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" -12.33 -18.63 -11.64 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 66.24 14.62 29.81 0 1
endif
else
if iRSWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 16.9 -12 4.3 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" -117.5 -13.3 247.8 0 1
elseif iRSWeapType == 1
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 18.1 -10.3 -9.4 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" -108 -2.4 -70.6 0 1
elseif eval iRSWeapType == 9
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 5.36 -11.68 -8.99 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" 174.97 37.44 100.21 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RS" 18.77 -12.01 -7.39 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RS" -104.28 -2.56 -151.77 0 1
endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Left Hip: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 1 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRHWeap set iLHWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur else set iLHWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iHkLHWeapType endif
if eval iLHWeapType == 1 || iLHWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LH" 10.11 7.04 12.96 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LH" -1.43 -2.19 -145.26 0 1
else
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LHL" 10 -2.8 -7.2 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LHL" 0 3.8 3 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node LH" 1.7 -2.5 15.3 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node LH" 0.4 -181.5 38.8 0 1
endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Right Hip: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 3 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap set iRHWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur == 4 && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkRSWeap && QSATTTMainQ.rWeapCur != QSATTTMainQ.rHkLHWeap set iRHWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iWeapTypeCur else set iRHWeapType to QSATTTMainQ.iHkRHWeapType endif
if eval iRHWeapType == 1 || iRHWeapType == 2
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RH" 10.11 7.04 -12.96 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RH" 1.43 2.19 -145.26 0 1
else
if QSMCMVarsQuest.iLoweredWeaps
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHL" 10 -2.8 7.2 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHL" 0 -3.8 3 0 1
else
Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RH" 1.7 -2.5 -15.3 1 Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RH" -0.4 181.5 38.8 0 1
endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Nades: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if eval !(QSMCMVarsQuest.iGrenadeSide) ;Nade set to right by default
if QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 10 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 -9.2 -10 1 ;Right Nade position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" 49 16 85.2 0 1 elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 11 || QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 12 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 1 -8.8 -5.7 1 ;Right Mine position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" -116 -9.1 0 0 1 elseif QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 13 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 1 -5.2 -10.9 1 ;Right Throwable position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" 8 -6 49 0 1 endif
else
if QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 10 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 -9.2 10 1 ;Left Nade position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" -49 -16 85.2 0 1 elseif eval QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 11 || QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 12 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 1 -8.8 5.7 1 ;Left Mine position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" -54 -9.1 0 0 1 elseif QSATTTMainQ.iGrenType == 13 Player.SetNifBlockTranslation "ATTT Node RHGren" 1 -5.2 10.9 1 ;Left Throwable position Player.SetNifBlockRotation "ATTT Node RHGren" -8 6 49 0 1 endif
endif
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Renaming Nodes on attached weapons & Hiding 1st Person Attached models: ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node LS" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RS" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node LH" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RH" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node LHL" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHL" 0 1 2 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "ATTT Node RHGren" 0 1 2
Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack_ATTTLS" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "##SpeedLoader_ATTTLS" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack_ATTTRS" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "##SpeedLoader_ATTTRS" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack_ATTTLH" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "##SpeedLoader_ATTTLH" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "Backpack_ATTTRH" 0 1 1 Player.SetNifBlockFlag "##SpeedLoader_ATTTRH" 0 1 1
End

scn QSATTTQTErrorMsgUDF
int iButton
begin Function {iButton}
if iButton == 0 elseif iButton == 1 let QSATTTInitialScriptQuest.iShowQTError := 1 endif
End

scn QSATTTGetHolsterFilePath
ref rWeap int iFlagsMask int iReload int iWeapType string_var sEditor
Begin Function { rWeap }
set iFlagsMask to GetWeaponFlags1 rWeap set iReload to GetReloadAnim rWeap set iWeapType to GetWeapType rWeap
SetFunctionValue ""
if IsRefInList QSATTTListHolsterExclude rWeap != -1 else
if IsRefInList QSATTTListRifleHolsterIncludeClassic rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\2handrifle"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListRifleHolsterIncludeTactical rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\2handautomatic"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListPistolHolsterIncludeClassic rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\SmallRevolver"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListPistolHolsterIncludeClassicBig rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\LargeRevolver"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListPistolHolsterIncludeTactical rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\1handpistol"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListKatanaSheathInclude rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\nvdlc05\weapons\1handmelee\nvdlc05katana"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListMacheteSheathInclude rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\weapons\1handmelee\machete"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListKnifeSheathInclude rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\CombatKnifeSheath"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTList357MagHolsterInclude rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\weapons\1handpistol\357revolver"
elseif IsRefInList QSATTTListBroadSheathInclude rWeap != -1
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\nvdlcpre2\weapons\1handmelee\tribalmachete"
elseif FileExists ("meshes\ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\" + (GetWeaponModel rWeap 0))
let sEditor := "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\" + $(GetWeaponModel rWeap 0) Sv_Replace ".nif|", sEditor SetFunctionValue sEditor
elseif rWeap == WeapNV357RevolverUnique
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\weapons\1handpistol\357revolverCustom"
elseif eval iWeapType == 5 && (iReload == 0 || iReload == 8 || iReload == 9 || iReload == 12 || iReload == 20 || iReload == 21 || iReload == 22)
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\2handrifle"
elseif eval iWeapType == 6 && (iReload == 5 || iReload == 13)
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\2handautomatic"
elseif eval iWeapType == 3 && (GetBit iFlagsMask, 1 == 0)
if eval iReload == 4
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\SmallRevolver"
elseif iReload == 20
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\weapons\1handpistol\357revolver"
elseif eval iReload == 14 || iReload == 15
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\LargeRevolver"
elseif iReload == 16
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\weapons\1handpistol\ThatGun"
else
SetFunctionValue "ArmedToTheTeeth\Holsters\1handpistol"
endif
endif endif End
